name: Marble Quest
description:
Created from 7/10 to 7/12 2020 as a part of the GMTK Game Jam!

How to play:  Drag and drop the marbles to attack the enemies and escape from this strange, monster filled land.

Note:  If you want to start the game over, press the button on the bottom left of the title screen (that resets your saved progress)

Had a great time working on this with great people.  Good luck to everyone (and go get some sleep!)
